p: The studied area, belonging to an arid region, is the Garrigues district (in Catalan ‘comarca’), located in west Catalonia, NE Iberian Peninsula (Fig. 1). Our study has focused on the Garrigues sensu lato, also including nine municipalities that had previously been located in the Garrigues district but currently belong to Segrià district and are known as historical Garrigues [ 38].
